Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#We adopted young, but look on the bright side! At least we won't be super old when our kids are grown up.#A cool old house, a couple kids, and an amazing farm. I never thought I'd come this far... but, hey! Our lives are just getting started.$h

Changes.Logname: Elliott adoption, love portraits true, platonic

Entries.NPC.cs.4442: I feel ill this morning...I think it's my nerves about the adoption paperwork. I hope I filled it out correctly.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4446: I just feel like sleeping today. I was up late writing out my fears surrounding parenthood, as a form of catharsis...$s#$b#I hope the adoption agency gets back to us soon.$7
Entries.NPC.cs.4443: I'm tired... could you make your own breakfast?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: My dearest friend... There's no one I'd rather raise a child with than you.$l#$e#Do you think I should write a short story about a writer who adopts a baby? ...No, too obvious.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: My dearest friend... There's no one I'd rather raise a child with than you.$l#$e#Do you think I should write a short story about a writer who adopts a baby? ...No, too obvious.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4445: {{TermofEndearment}}, between my affinity for the fine arts and yours for the natural world, we can't help but raise a well-rounded child. Don't you think so?$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {{TermofEndearment}}, between my affinity for the fine arts and yours for the natural world, we can't help but raise a well-rounded child. Don't you think so?$h

Entries.OneKid_3: I think we should adopt another kid. Vincent keeps asking when he gets to be a 'double uncle.'$h
